about_the_game:
This is a retro-style Chinese open-world RPG game set in a cultivation-themed universe, where your only advantages against powerful enemies are time and the wit of a time-traveler. In this world of cultivation, you can take on the role of a protagonist whom you customize, freely developing your abilities, skills, and beast taming. You choose your companions and sect, venture through various secret realms, encounter a myriad of strange and wondrous adventures, complete tasks for different cultivators, and reach the pinnacle of cultivation realms, ultimately changing the impending fate of the cultivation world.

In addition to improving your cultivation through combat, you can also grow stronger with the support of various lifestyle gameplay elements. Amidst the main themes of continuous combat, cultivation improvement, and breaking through realms, experience the harsh yet aspirational world of cultivation.
detailed_description:
About us

We are an independent development team that is amateur and non-programmer, consisting of three novices from different professions.

Everything is new for us to learn, and our game's design points are also distinctly different from many similar games on the market due to our atypical nature. Of course, the development of the game is also slow as a result, which is why we have opened a beta version and released an early access version of the game.

However, we will do our best to create a unique game, both for the players within the game and for the game itself. That is our original intention!
